com.kennyscott.commons.dbutils
Class Update

java.lang.Object
  com.kennyscott.commons.dbutils.AbstractMain
      com.kennyscott.commons.dbutils.Update

public class Update
extends AbstractMain

This class shows how to update data in the database, especially using variable number of parameters, which came in with Java 5.

execute

protected void execute(java.lang.String[] args)
We start off with minimal data, then update the info on the Renault. Then we throw caution to the wind and get a Ferrari. We see the state of the table before and after each change.
